name: Requiem (itch) (fabiankozielski)
description:
Requiem is a psychological horror game featuring an unknown protagonist who experiences supernatural occurrences in a never-ending cycle.

Record, replay and investigate inexplicable aural anomalies using your tape recorder. Reproduce shards of the past as your sanity keeps deteriorating and escape this enigmatic nightmare.

Credits

Jegor Baraev

Fabian Kozielski

Michael Xu
